[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)
[CDT] SHALL contain [1..1] confidentialityCode
[CDT] CONF-HP-23: SHALL contain [1..1] effectiveTime
[CDT] SHALL contain [1..1] id
[CDT] CONF-HP-24: SHALL contain [1..1] languageCode
[CDT] SHALL contain [1..1] realmCode/@code = "US"
[CDT] CONF-HP-22: SHALL contain [1..1] title
[CDT] SHALL contain [1..1] typeId
[CDT] CONF-HP-16: SHALL satisfy: The extension attribute of the typeId element SHALL be POCD_HD000040.
[CDT] CONF-HP-17: SHALL satisfy: The ClinicalDocument/id element SHALL be present. The ClinicalDocument/id/@root attribute SHALL be a syntactically correct UUID or OID.
[CDT] CONF-HP-18: SHALL satisfy: UUIDs SHALL be represented in the form XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX, where each X is a character from the set [A-Fa-f0-9].

[CDT] CONF-HP-19: SHALL satisfy: OIDs SHALL be represented in dotted decimal notation, where each decimal number is either 0, or starts with a nonzero digit. More formally, an OID SHALL be in the form ([0-2])(.([1-9][0-9]*|0))+.
[CDT] CONF-HP-20: SHALL satisfy: OIDs SHALL be no more than 64 characters in length.
[CDT] CONF-HP-25: SHALL satisfy: languageCode SHALL be in the form nn, or nn-CC.
[CDT] CONF-HP-26: SHALL satisfy: The nn portion of languageCode SHALL be a legal ISO-639-1 language code in lowercase.
[CDT] CONF-HP-27: SHALL satisfy: The CC portion languageCode, if present, SHALL be an ISO-3166 country code in uppercase.
[CDT] CONF-HP-28: SHALL satisfy: Both setId and versionNumber SHALL be present or both SHALL be absent.
[CDT] CONF-HP-29: SHALL satisfy: The @extension and/or @root of setId and id SHALL be different when both are present.
[CDT] CONF-HP-30: SHALL satisfy: A copyTime element SHALL NOT be present.
[IHE] SHALL satisfy: self.getSections()->exists(sect : cda::Section | sect.getActs()->exists(act : cda::Act | act.oclIsKindOf(ihe::ProblemConcernEntry)))
[IHE] SHALL satisfy: self.getSections()->exists(sect : cda::Section | sect.getActs()->exists(act : cda::Act | act.oclIsKindOf(ihe::AllergyIntoleranceConcern)))
[IHE] SHALL satisfy: self.getSections()->exists(sect : cda::Section | sect.getSubstanceAdministrations()->exists(sub : cda::SubstanceAdministration | sub.oclIsKindOf(ihe::Medication)))
